review: I bought this along side my Kindle HDX 7, but I think it might have been a mistake. It took forever to finally find my Wi-fi signal. The first time trying, it kept dropping connection or not finding one at all. After it finally found a connection the stick then froze on me. Finally after getting it connected and stable I tried display mirroring with my Kindle HDX 7, tried is the key word. My kindle could see the fire stick, but when trying to connect it just kept trying to no avail. I then loaded up a video, the video seemed to take much longer to load, and kept buffering. I thought this would be a step up from my Vizio smart TV streaming options, but doesn't seem like it at this point. I'm gonna try it out some more tomorrow, but if it doesn't start working and flawlessly I'll be sending it back for sure.
